title: Cloud Atlas 2012 BRrip 1080P x264 MP4 - Ofek
description:
Please leave feedback!

Source: Bluray

Used denoise & sharpening filters, looks extremely crisp. Subtitles were done myself, and are perfect. It took a very long time, in fact, because whoever did them at the studio was blatantly not a full-time English speaker (and no, I'm not talking about the future/valley talk).
